# allHTTPHeaderFields

**Instance Property**

A dictionary containing all of the HTTP header fields for a request.

## Declaration

```swift
var allHTTPHeaderFields: [String : String]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Certain header fields are reserved (see [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSURLRequest#Reserved-HTTP-headers]). Do not use this property to set such headers.

## Accessing header fields

- **addValue(_:forHTTPHeaderField:)**: Adds a value to the header field.
- **setValue(_:forHTTPHeaderField:)**: Sets a value for the header field.

items.description: Adds a value to the header field.
